credit_line: Museum purchase from Sir Arthur Bryan and General Acquisitions Endowment Funds
dimensions: H x W x D (elements arranged as a group): 21 x 27.5 x 26 cm (8 1/4 x 10 13/16 x 10 1/4 in.)
title: Kubus
description: Set of 18 clear glass rectangular and square-shaped modular, nesting food and beverage storage containers and lids. Containers range in height from 1 3/4 in. to 6 1/4 in. Group includes: two 7 1/8 in. square dishes (-1,-2), one 7 1/8 in. square lid (-3); two rectangular dishes and lids (-4/-7), one tall  3 1/2 in. square pitcher (-8), two short 3 5/8 in. square pitchers (-11,-12), four 3 1/2 in. square dishes (-13/-16), four 3 1/2 in. square lids, (-9, -10,-17, -18).
name: Stacking storage container set
